name: FacadeCommand
description: A facade command is a public command masking the underlying complexity.

name: Command
description: A command is an intent to mutate the state of the system.

name: Result
description: A result provides a feedback about an already processed message.

name: DomainEvent
description: A domain event notifies something significant happened about an aggregate.

name: IntegrationEvent
description: An integration event notifies to other systems something happened.

name: Query
description: A query is a wish to get a point of view of the state of the system.

name: ReadModel
description: A read model provides the information that needs to be available to take a given decision.

name: UserInterface
description: A user interface helps users to interact with the system.

name: Aggregate
description: An aggregate expresses domain aspects that can be treated as a single unit.

name: Service
description: A service implements domain operations which cannot belong to an aggregate.

name: Policy
description: A policy captures the reactive logic of a process.

name: Saga
description: A saga is a long-lived business transaction.

name: Process
description: A process is a short-lived business transaction.

name: Timer
description: A timer represents a significant moment or period.

name: Person
description: A person who executes a command through a view.

name: System
description: A third-party service provider such as a payment gateway or shipping company.

name: Comment
description: A comment is used to provide additional information.
